text: Ndipo auze nkhani yabwino iwo amene ali ndi chikhulupiriro ndipo amachita ntchito zabwino kuti iwo adzakhala m’minda yothiriridwa ndi madzi a m’mitsinje yoyenda. Nthawi zonse akapatsidwa zipatso zochokera m’mindayo, iwo adzati: “Izi ndi zimene tinapatsidwa kale.” Chifukwa iwo adzapatsidwa zofanana nazo ndipo iwo adzakhala ndi akazi osakhuzidwa ndipo adzakhala kumeneko mpaka kalekale
